author: hwright
msg: Support svn_client_mergeinfo_log_merged() in the Ruby bindings.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make 'svn merge' pick a sane default operative revision range when a
peg revision is actually supplied to the single-URL form of the
(svn_cl__merge): Set the default youngest revision in the operative
range from the (specified, or default) peg revision.

author: hwright
msg: Fix Python 2.2 incompatibility in test suite (can move to 1.5.1 if

author: glasser
msg: Fix regression in svnsync which required the destination repository to
be 1.5 (instead of just 1.0!) to sync any revprops other than the
commit svn:log initially (instead of all but date/author).  If the
commit fails due to a "not implemented" error, set the flag to true
we just need to send date/author or everything-but-log.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Vote and approve r30431 and r30449.
